Name: Bermondsey Minute
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon and orange zest twists, and coffee beans.
EXPRESS orange and lemon zests over cocktail, and discard.
Review: Tequila and lavender are a match made in heaven, made more complex with herbal wine notes from the vermouth and aromatised by delicately fruity maraschino cherry. Dilution is so key to this cocktail that please consider serving on-the-rocks.
History: Created in Bermondsey, London in 2014 by yours truly and adapted from the New York Minute , originally by Luke Whearty at Der Raum, Melbourne.
Nutrition: One serving of Bermondsey Minute contains 205 calories
